tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "13C6FADA48FDAFF495FA0A86D69A9BB2", "Cargo is a special type of item that can only be stored in warehouses and must be transported in vehicles like a caravan. Cargo is either a commodity, purchased from a node vendor, or a crate packed with materials.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "273D47D3402E6B6BA5926B93AB8F6D25", "You can purchase empty crates at any caravansary and pack them with materials you\'d like to transport to another node.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "A422AD8D41015DB544DFA9943AD52274", "Warehouse staff will unpack your crate for you when you\'re ready. However, the items must be inspected, so it may be some time before your items are available to retrieve.")
